languages.text: {n}Старик глубоко задумывается.{/n} "Империум... Этому слуге звезд, облаков и затмений незнакомо сие слово. Колдовство жреца — есть дар Двуглавого Бога-орла, как может дар Его осуждаться смертными?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Старик глубоко задумывается.{/n} "Империум... Этому слуге звезд, облаков и затмений незнакомо сие слово. Колдовство жреца — есть дар Двуглавого Бога-орла, как может дар Его осуждаться смертными?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}The old man is deep in thought.{/n} "Imperium... This servant of the stars, clouds, and eclipses does not know this word. The priest's sorcery is a gift from the Two-Headed Eagle-God. How can His gift be condemned by mortals?"
languages.original_text: {n}Старик глубоко задумывается.{/n} "Империум... Этому слуге звезд, облаков и затмений незнакомо сие слово. Колдовство жреца — есть дар Двуглавого Бога-орла, как может дар Его осуждаться смертными?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man is deep in thought.{/n} "Imperium... This servant of the stars, clouds, and eclipses does not know this word. The priest's sorcery is a gift from the Two-Headed Eagle-God. How can His gift be condemned by mortals?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}El anciano está sumido en sus pensamientos.{/n} «Imperium... Este siervo de las estrellas, las nubes y los eclipses no conoce esta palabra. La hechicería del sacerdote es un don del Dios Águila de Dos Cabezas. ¿Cómo pueden los mortales condenar Su don?».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man is deep in thought.{/n} "Imperium... This servant of the stars, clouds, and eclipses does not know this word. The priest's sorcery is a gift from the Two-Headed Eagle-God. How can His gift be condemned by mortals?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano está sumido en sus pensamientos.{/n} "Imperium... Este siervo de las estrellas, las nubes y los eclipses no conoce esta palabra. La hechicería del sacerdote es un don del Dios Águila de Dos Cabezas. ¿Cómo pueden los mortales condenar Su don?».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}老人陷入了沉思。{/n}“‘帝国’……这位星辰、云彩和日蚀的仆人，并不清楚这个词的意思。祭司的巫术是双头鹰神的馈赠。凡人怎么能谴责祂的馈赠呢？”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man is deep in thought.{/n} "Imperium... This servant of the stars, clouds, and eclipses does not know this word. The priest's sorcery is a gift from the Two-Headed Eagle-God. How can His gift be condemned by mortals?"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人陷入了沉思。{/n}“‘帝国’……这位星辰、云彩和日蚀的仆人，并不清楚这个词的意思。祭司的巫术是双头鹰神的馈赠。凡人怎么能谴责祂的馈赠呢？”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}Le vieil homme se plonge dans ses pensées.{/n} « L'Imperium... Ce serviteur des étoiles, des nuages et des éclipses ne connaît pas ce mot. Sa sorcellerie est un don de l'Aigle-Dieu à deux têtes, comment pourrait-elle être condamnée par des mortels ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man is deep in thought.{/n} "Imperium... This servant of the stars, clouds, and eclipses does not know this word. The priest's sorcery is a gift from the Two-Headed Eagle-God. How can His gift be condemned by mortals?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme se plonge dans ses pensées.{/n} « L'Imperium... Ce serviteur des étoiles, des nuages et des éclipses ne connaît pas ce mot. Sa sorcellerie est un don de l'Aigle-Dieu à deux têtes, comment pourrait-elle être condamnée par des mortels ? »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}老人は深く考え込む。{/n}「帝国…この星と雲と触のしもべは、その言葉を知らない。この司祭の魔術は双頭の鷲神からの贈り物だ。その賜物がどうして人間から非難されよう？」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man is deep in thought.{/n} "Imperium... This servant of the stars, clouds, and eclipses does not know this word. The priest's sorcery is a gift from the Two-Headed Eagle-God. How can His gift be condemned by mortals?"

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は深く考え込む。{/n}「帝国…この星と雲と触のしもべは、その言葉を知らない。この司祭の魔術は双頭の鷲神からの贈り物だ。その賜物がどうして人間から非難されよう？」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann ist tief in Gedanken versunken.{/n} "Imperium ... Dieser Diener der Sterne, Wolken und Finsternissen kennt dieses Wort nicht. Die Hexerei des Priesters ist eine Gabe des zweiköpfigen Adler-Gottes. Wie kann seine Gabe von den Sterblichen verurteilt werden?"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man is deep in thought.{/n} "Imperium... This servant of the stars, clouds, and eclipses does not know this word. The priest's sorcery is a gift from the Two-Headed Eagle-God. How can His gift be condemned by mortals?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann ist tief in Gedanken versunken.{/n} "Imperium ... Dieser Diener der Sterne, Wolken und Finsternissen kennt dieses Wort nicht. Die Hexerei des Priesters ist eine Gabe des zweiköpfigen Adler-Gottes. Wie kann seine Gabe von den Sterblichen verurteilt werden?"
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar adam, derin düşüncelere dalıyor.{/n} "İmparatorluk... Yıldızların, bulutların ve tutulmaların bu hizmetkârı, bu kelimeyi bilmiyor. Rahibin sahirliği, Çift Başlı Kartal Tanrı'dan bir armağandır. O'nun armağanı, fâniler tarafından nasıl ayıplanabilir?"
languages.original_text: {n}The old man is deep in thought.{/n} "Imperium... This servant of the stars, clouds, and eclipses does not know this word. The priest's sorcery is a gift from the Two-Headed Eagle-God. How can His gift be condemned by mortals?"
